ing: 1 (16.5 ounce) can pitted Bing cherries, drained, juice reserved
1 (12 fluid ounce) can cola-flavored carbonated beverage
1 (6 ounce) package black cherry flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
des: "Cherry gelatin mold with Bing cherries, pineapple, and pecans. This has been my family's favorite for Thanksgiving for many, many years."
ins: In a saucepan, combine the reserved cherry juice with the cola. Bring to a boil, and stir in the gelatin until dissolved. Remove from the heat, and mix in the drained cherries, drained pineapple, and chopped pecans. Pour mixture into a mold sprayed with non-stick cooking spray, and refrigerate for at least 24 hours before serving.
